data.lyric:
[ti:Beautiful Crazy]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:Beautiful Crazy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Beautiful Crazy - Luke Combs
[00:05.14]Written by：Wyatt B. Durrette/Robert Williford/Luke Combs
[00:10.29]Her day starts with a coffee
[00:12.32]
[00:13.16]And ends with a wine
[00:14.74]Takes forever get ready
[00:17.38]So she's never on time for anything
[00:21.42]
[00:24.29]But she gets that come get me
[00:26.99]That look in her eye
[00:28.93]
[00:29.46]Well it kinda scares me
[00:31.85]The way that she drives me wild
[00:35.66]
[00:37.57]But she drives me wild
[00:41.40]
[00:43.51]Beautiful
[00:45.26]
[00:45.79]Crazy she can't help but
[00:49.73]
[00:50.43]Amaze me
[00:52.74]The way that she dances
[00:54.80]Ain't afraid to take chances
[00:57.45]And wears her heart on her sleeve
[01:00.75]
[01:01.42]Yeah she's crazy
[01:03.24]
[01:03.80]But her crazy's beautiful to me
[01:08.41]
[01:11.07]She makes plans for the weekend
[01:13.51]Can't wait to go out
[01:15.32]
[01:15.82]Till she changes her mind
[01:17.81]Says let's stay on the couch and watch TV
[01:22.12]
[01:24.28]And she falls asleep
[01:30.26]Beautiful
[01:32.48]Crazy she can't help but
[01:36.44]
[01:37.14]Amaze me
[01:39.49]The way that she dances
[01:41.69]Ain't afraid to take chances
[01:44.16]And wears her heart on her sleeve
[01:47.56]
[01:48.11]Yeah she's crazy
[01:50.55]But her crazy's beautiful to me
[01:57.45]She's unpredictable unforgettable
[02:02.27]It's unusual unbelievable
[02:06.98]How I'm such a fool
[02:09.22]Yeah I'm such a fool for her
[02:13.91]
[02:17.08]Beautiful
[02:18.46]
[02:19.39]Crazy she can't help but
[02:22.99]
[02:23.89]Amaze me
[02:26.28]The way that she dances
[02:28.22]Ain't afraid to take chances
[02:30.77]And wears her heart on her sleeve
[02:34.92]Yeah she's crazy
[02:36.99]
[02:37.64]She's crazy
[02:39.95]She's crazy
[02:41.96]But her crazy's beautiful to me
[02:51.37]
[02:52.03]Her crazy's beautiful to me
